blog.name: dudewayspecialfarewell
blog.title: SDUGONG
blog.description:
In quella stagione non era raro per me sognarmi chiuso a bozzolo nella mia copertona gialla, in camera mia, mentre fuori il  torrido sole di agosto asciugava le pietre. E sognavo gente che passeggiava per strade assolate, sognavo l'asfalto incandescente che sembrava acqua raccolta in una pozza, ma sognavo tutto dal mio bozzolo di lana gialla in  camera mia, ed io restavo lì immobile a sognare. Svegliandomi andavo in giro a chiedere aiuto ai passanti, ai barboni, agli amici più cari, ai parenti, alla fidanzata dicevo “ Qualora mi rinchiudessi a bozzolo nella mia coperta gialla, venite e tiratemi  fuori!”,  e tutti sorridevano dicendo che sarebbero venuti. Poi calò il silenzio, venne il freddo, il sonno, la fame e nessuno schiuse quel bozzolo, alla fine eravamo io ed il bozzolo e lui mi stava uccidendo. Chiesi ancora aiuto a tutti, e tutti sbatterono la porta in faccia. Alla fine l'odore di putrefazione e muffa e le infezioni che dava quel tessuto oramai lurido mi obbligarono ad abbandonarlo, per andare a cercare una vita che avevo perso, per andare a guardare quanti pomelli chiusi si può avere una città di notte, in quanti bar non potevo andare alle quattro del mattino, quanto sporca era la mia stanza, quante erano e gocce di pioggia che potevano cadere dal cielo in un secondo. Poi scoprì che quando avevo persone a cui chiedere ero nel bozzolo, e che tutto ciò che tutto ciò che facevo era infilarmi il mio bozzolo, e tutto quello che ho fatto poi è stato tirarmene fuori. Fine

Se volete sostenere questo Tumblr potete farlo gratis, basta copiare il link
https://beta.tatatu.com/?tid=cde17b79-1566-45cc-9220-9b8b8a4b7f0d&lang=en

 e registrarvi a Tatatu. è gratuto, e vi dà anche film gratis da guardare, e 7 euro circa in cryptovalute. Grazie a chi deciderà di sostenere questo progetto =)

blog.name: eldritchsart
blog.title: エレナ 芸術
blog.description:
Hello everyone!
My name's Elena and I am an extremely shy artist who loves drawing original characters and gaming.

summary: When did you start drawing and why? What kept you going on? Btw I love your art!!
question: When did you start drawing and why? What kept you going on? Btw I love your art!!
answer:
AAAAAA thank you so much!! This means a whole lot to me!!

I’ve been drawing for as long as I’ve been able to hold a pencil, literally. I was terrible, I even refused to draw ears and noses because they didn’t look ‘’pretty’’ to me!

But back then, the people around me always encouraged me. Since I was a child, my parents wanted to send me to an art school when I’d grow up.  I remember my teacher at the kindergarten, she would always display my artwork around the classroom!

Although, in the elementary school, everything fell apart. My teacher would tear my drawings, saying that I wasn’t good enough and that I’d never make it into art. I was being bullied, only a few stood up to defend me.

Surprisingly enough, it didn’t discourage me. I didn’t stop making art, my love for it was way stronger.

In the middle school, I have been lucky enough to have a teacher who encouraged me and I really got affectionate to her. I had been targeted as ‘the artist’ in the class and I loved it!

Now I’m in art school and even though I’m not ‘perfect’ as an artist, I’m proud of how far I got.

I wrote this to tell you that, no matter how many people judge you, be proud of what you create. Don’t let them bring you down, don’t let them win. 

If every artist renounced to draw after bad words by other people, we wouldn’t have their masterpieces today! And believe me, everyone is being criticized. Even the masters of the past that we study and admire today have been strongly criticized!

Just please, KEEP DOING WHAT YOU LOVE! I’m sure that everyone can become an amazing artist with practice and especially love for what they’re doing! 

I hope I’ve been clear enough!

Chibi Commissions

Hey lovelies, I’m opening three slots for chibi watercolor commissions.

• Medium: Watercolor
• Size: A5 (14,8 x 21 cm)


• Price: 45 € (incl. shipping worldwide)
• add. character: + 20 €
• max. 2 characters per commission

• Do: OCs, Fanart, chibiself, light nsfw
• Don’t: mecha, furry, gore

• Payment: bank transfer (EU only), PayPal

If you’re interested, send me a mail at request@zeichenwut.com

blog.name: surferofrowdybliss
blog.title: Visual Play
blog.description:
Deborah Coulter

Scissors in hand, I make collages exploring the freedom and fun of visual play. I get lost in the joy of selecting, cutting, and rearranging images. The process begins as I discover the infinite possibilities life offers through the spaciousness of an open heart. Children, animals, and nature lead the way.

I invite you to join me in these adventures of scissors & glue blending with imagination in the exquisite present.

https://instagram.com/deborahcoulterartflow/

http://society6.com/deborahcoulter

summary: ©Deborah Coulter 2018 Collage for week of November 11...a passion for quiet snowfall delivering gifts of beauty and awe....
caption:
©Deborah Coulter 2018

Collage for week of November 11…a passion for quiet snowfall delivering gifts of beauty and awe.

Saturday Splashback

I had fun making this collage back in 2014 to celebrate Winter Solstice. It was a challenge to cut all the tiny designs for the snow without them disappearing from my fingers and falling like snowflakes to the floor.
